content:
Over the past day, the Orichiv and Kherson directions destroyed the reactive system of Grad and 3 SPRs ("Arrow-10", "Tunguska" and portable).

About thisreported March 24Defense forces of South of Ukraine.

In addition, during the day was destroyed:

- 124 invaders;

- 104 units of weapons and military equipment, including:

- 18 guns;

- 8 mortars;

- 2 easel grenade launchers;

- 1 anti -tank rocket complex;

- 2 portable stations of electronic wrestling;

- 2 UAV management antennas;

- 3 UAV management stations;

- 1 reconnaissance UAV;

- 1 communication tower;

- 1 unit of radio equipment;

-58 units of auto-bronze;

- 3 aerial stations.

Two more ammunition and armor were destroyed, as well as the location of the enemy's personnel.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat three howitzers and a mortar position of the enemy were destroyed by Terroboronivtsi.
title: In the south, 3 enemy SCRs and "Grad" are amazed
description: This was reported on March 24 by defense forces of southern Ukraine. In addition, during the day ...
author: Army Inform
